book.synopsis: Remo, now the Reigning Master of Sinanju, must rid the world of the best assassins, proving that the Sinanju is the best strategic weapon around, but an evil enemy, bent on revenge, waits in the shadows to fulfill a prophecy of destruction that involves the death of the Destroyer. Original.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4.5 Inches, Weight: 0.4 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
